biocontainers.name: protmapper
biocontainers.summary: Map protein sites to human reference sequence.

biotools.summary:
Assembling a phosphoproteomic knowledge base using ProtMapper to normalize phosphosite information from databases and text mining. 
Map amino acid sites of post-translational modifications from models or data to reference positions.

Code to generate results and figures relevant to the ProtMapper manuscript.

The Protmapper maps references to protein sites to the human reference sequence based on UniProt, PhosphoSitePlus, and manual curation.
